title: Pedagogical Competency Enhancement: Comparative Analysis Based on General Pedagogy and Instructional Design Models

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Core theoretical elements can be analyzed by comparing the historical development of General Didactics (GD) and Instructional Design (ID)
Model-building approaches in both fields can be evaluated, and their applicability in science education contexts can be discussed
Problems in model-based theory development can be identified from philosophical and philosophy-of-science perspectives, with improvement strategies proposed
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
